creditline: Collection of American Decorative Art 1900 Foundation
description: a: desk top; b: rotating desk bottom; neo-gothic style elaborate abstract plant design carved front and back of bottom half and spiral on PR side; fabric visible through carvings; 4 drawers, PL side of bottom half; triangular-shaped top with 2 finials; fall-front desk with metal latch
title: Fall-front rotating desk
